title: Hurricane
information: Hurricanes are not just a coastal problem. Find out how rain, wind, water could happen where you live so you can start preparing now. Be sure to consider how COVID-19 may affect your plans. Keep in mind that your best protection from the effects of a hurricane may differ from your best protection from diseases, such as coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

title: Tornado
information: If you can safely get to a sturdy building, then do so immediately.Go to a safe room, basement, or storm cellar. If you are in a building with no basement, then get to a small interior room on the lowest level.
